ComicInfo.Summary:
Daddy Jonah, an herbal healer, is chased by the townsfolk until he befriends a little boy who helps him save the town doctor.
When Phil and Mary Coyle buy a new house in the country, the townsfolk try to scare them away.
Don Young never cared about saving money, until he got married and then worked himself into an early grave.
A dog's constant howling drives a man to take drastic action.
ComicInfo.Title: Daddy's Gone A-Haunting!; Within These Walls Dwells Fear; Would You Want to Know the Day You Die?; The Hound of Night; Hand-Made Haunted House!
ComicInfo.Writer: Dave Wood,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Al Case,George Kashdan,Dave Wood,Al Case
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
